review_title: Company provides good opportunities for those striving for development
years_at_company: Company provides good opportunities for those striving for development

pros:
Hi all, I’ve been working for this company a couple of years on manager’s position.
From my point of view, it is a great company for all the categories of employee.
If you are junior, you have a real chance to grow with the company, and grow rapidly.
But, my personal confidence, it is a really good company for senior guys, who got bored in the large corporations,
It is a real chance to remember, what the real business is and to feel you alive.
cons: Slightly shifted the work-life balance

pros: great culture, opportunity, and market position.
cons: nothing negative. in the period of rapid growth need to keep more focus on customers and employees.

pros: Being in a small team you develop relationships with anyone that does not directly engage with senior management. The culture does in itself does not seem to support collaboration so the small teams on the customer service side support and help one another.
cons: Benefits are awful... Company encourages "throw your co-worker under the bus" environment ... be prepared to be spoken down too and belittled on a daily basis. Reminded me of a daycare for adults ... Do not waste your time. There is no room for growth, no one respects your opinion and they favor those that do as they say and bring no innovation to an already broken work environment.

pros: Great environment to work in.
cons: Not being able to grow with in the company

review_title: Company of Energy, Success and Achievements
years_at_company: Company of Energy, Success and Achievements

cons: I wish I get more information on business development and financials of the company at least on quarterly basis.
advice_to_mgmt: Would be great to have a policy in place to work at least one day a week from home.

pros: Great Company to work for, consistently growing at a rapid pace. The company continually works on new products. The environment and people are great to work with. Highly suggest working here.
cons: no company is perfect, they all have their pros and cons, overall no major complaints, just a lot to learn.

review_title: Good Jumping Off Point for My Career
years_at_company: Good Jumping Off Point for My Career
pros: I came into B2B Soft with little sales experience but grew to a sales manager in just a few years. I was mentored and trained and given good feedback on my performance. My salary grew during that time as well. My team enjoys working with each other and we work hard and have fun
cons: I was unable to keep growing within the company and reached my potential here so had to move on. I think as the company grows there will be more opportunity for internal growth.

years_at_company: Unorganized, Executives are never present, looks like a fire sale

review_title: Excellent company to work for, opportunity for growth and advancement.
years_at_company: Excellent company to work for, opportunity for growth and advancement.
pros:
Location- great location in NYC, Battery park with incredible views of the NYC harbor.

Management- friendly management team, competitive compensation, promote within the company for further advancement.
cons: Small office space, the elevators in the building are often tied up.
advice_to_mgmt: Excellent organization with an opportunity for advancement.

review_title: Like the product, like the people, like the attitude
years_at_company: Like the product, like the people, like the attitude
pros:
I recently joined the product department. I like that the company is working with agile/scrum and listens to people on various levels. I feel that I CAN influence things around here and this is a huge relief after working for a large 3 letters corporation not to be mentioned here.

I like the use of new technology and mobile versions etc. In general a good company to work for - so far I am pretty satisfied.
cons: As far as cons go - this may be an issue with all fast growing companies - there are quite a few "new" people. I.e. people that been working here for less than 2 years. Sometimes it is good and sometimes it has mixed consequences.

pros:
I decided to write a review because I saw the other guy bashing the company. I am not sure what his problem was, but this is a good company to work for. I have been here for 4 years and the company grew fast and hired a lot of new employees and I guess this guy did not work out. Whatever. The management is fine - you know how it is - management is management and what they do is not always what I like, but for the most time it is very reasonable.

The team is great - very mixed culturally, which is always fun, especially at parties. Location is good, lots of good food around and subway close-by.
cons: I don't know what to write here. It is not like everything is ideal, but you know how it is - in every place there are some pros and cons. I think I want more company activities together.
advice_to_mgmt: Let's do more company parties etc. Bowling was fun for Christmas

review_title: Great Company to work for. Growing fast and "start-up" mentality
years_at_company: Great Company to work for. Growing fast and "start-up" mentality
pros:
This is a 10 year old company, but I like the fact the environment is a lot like a Start-up. Most people have been here for a few years at least and there are also a lot of new people comping on board for new positions.

Location is amazing, although I do not have a statue of liberty view like some of the execs do :) I commute from Brooklyn (sheapshead bay area) about 40 min.

Culture is very easy going - you work from 9 till 6 with an hour break in the middle for the most part. There is occasional travel to shows and such.

Overall I have been here for 3.5 years now and I do not think I am going anywhere anytime soon.

Benefits are generally standard - vacation, sick days, health etc.
cons: Nothing is ever perfect,so I would not say there are no cons. I think the office, though big, is becoming too crowded with all the new people coming on board and I would like to see us either moving somewhere or getting a new office (and maybe bigger cubicles :))
advice_to_mgmt:
1. More coffee flavors in the coffee machine :)
2. Bigger office.
3. Add life insurance to benefits

review_title: Incompetence, insecurity, waste of resume space
years_at_company: Incompetence, insecurity, waste of resume space
pros: Location is nice. Battery Park. Rank and file staff quite nice. I wish I had twenty kind words to say about this outfit...
cons:
Company is run like an off-brand auto shop. Worst of the corporate traits and startup problems all rolled into one.

Top 3 managers collectively lack any standard management skills. Unfortunately, they don't have anything special to compensate for the missing skills.

Effect is that of Lord of the Flies: senior management is like children pretending to be adults, with horrible results.
advice_to_mgmt: Sell the company and let somene else run it.

review_title: Good place to get an experience
years_at_company: Good place to get an experience

pros: I have joined B2B Soft 5 months ago and I have nothing but good things to say about the company. I started as a IT Recruiter who didn’t speak Ukrainian/Russian, everyone in the company was supportive, helpful and welcoming. Despite we only communicating in English I still got promoted to Senior IT Recruiter recently. If you are willing to work and do the job that you are supposed to do company will allow you to grow your career in any direction that you want. It is pleasure working at B2B Soft, i actually like going to work every morning!
cons: I have nothing to add here!
